metadata.title: CVE-2023-29465 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: SageMath FlintQS 1.0 relies on pathnames under TMPDIR (typicallyworld-writable), which (for example) allows a local user to overwrite fileswith the privileges of a different user (who is running FlintQS).

criterions.comment: flintqs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
